transArray.content: The front desk service is warm and the breakfast is delicious. It’s really great. I’ll stay here next time I come to Beijing. It’s really good, very good, very good, very good, very good, very good, very good.

Dear guests, hello! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. We are very happy to receive your excellent praise and encouragement. It is our responsibility to provide you with high-quality services. We sincerely want to give you the best we have. The hotel provides a laundry room and a garment steamer, which provides great convenience for your travels. The breakfast variety is also rich, and freshly baked croissants, egg tarts, and rice porridge made with pure water and Northeast Wuchang rice are available. If you taste it, be sure to remember to come and visit often. We will, as always, cherish every encounter and strive to bring you different touches and surprises. I wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhao Dan
